markdown: 16. Courses in which you wish to enroll: (Please read instructions carefully and check the appropriate boxes). A.M. Schedule --- Fundamentals of Biostatistics M-T-W-Th-F. If you have selected this course, do not select the following morning courses: Alternate option Principles and Methods of Epidemiologic Research T-Th-S: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Occupational Hazards T-Th-S: [x] and option Epidemiology of Cancer M-W-F: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Diseases M-W-F: [x] P.M. Schedule --- Fundamentals of Epidemiology M-T-Th-F If you have selected this course, do not select the following afternoon courses: Alternate option Health Services Planning and Evaluation T-Th: [x] or option Epidemiology of Injuries T-Th: [ ] and option Infectious Disease Epidemiology M-W-F: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Nutritional Diseases and Abnormalities M-W-F: [x] 17. Schuman, Program Director, Epidemiology Summer Session, Division of Epidemiology, Room 1-117 Unit A, Health Sciences Building, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota 55455. APPLICATIONS MUST BE RECEIVED BY MAY 17. <::attestation: Seal/Stamp Status: Faded, illegible Readable Text: [illegible] A faded circular stamp/seal, centrally located.::> The University of Minnesota adheres to the principle that all persons shall have equal opportunity and access to facilities in any phase of University activity without regard to race, creed, color, sex, age or national origin. Under this principle, educational, cultural, social, housing, extra curricular and employment opportunities are available to all on an equal basis.

chunks.markdown: 16. Courses in which you wish to enroll: (Please read instructions carefully and check the appropriate boxes).
A.M. Schedule --- Fundamentals of Biostatistics M-T-W-Th-F. If you have selected this course, do not select the following morning courses:

Alternate option Principles and Methods of Epidemiologic Research T-Th-S: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Occupational Hazards T-Th-S: [x] and option Epidemiology of Cancer M-W-F: [ ] or option Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Diseases M-W-F: [x]
P.M. Schedule --- Fundamentals of Epidemiology M-T-Th-F If you have selected this course, do not select the following afternoon courses:
Alternate option Health Services Planning and Evaluation T-Th: [x] or option Epidemiology of Injuries T-Th: [ ] and option Infectious Disease Epidemiology M-W-F: [ ] or

option Epidemiology of Nutritional Diseases and Abnormalities M-W-F: [x] 17. Please make the following room reservation for me: option Middlebrook Hall (Two in a room, twin beds): [x] Arrive: 6/19/76 Depart: 7/10/76

<::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: illegible Readable Text: 18. Signature of Applicant, Date 3/4/76 A handwritten signature is present on a line next to "18. Signature of Applicant" and "Date 3/4/76" on the right::>

<::attestation: Signature and approval statement Approved Signature: legible Readable Text: 19. I approve of this application Leonard T. Kurland, M.D. Department Chairman or Adviser A handwritten signature is placed above the printed name and title, next to an approval statement.::>

Send this form with check for $25.00, made payable to the University of Minnesota, to: Dr. Leonard M. Schuman, Program Director, Epidemiology Summer Session, Division of Epidemiology, Room 1-117 Unit A, Health Sciences Building, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota 55455.
APPLICATIONS MUST BE RECEIVED BY MAY 17.
<::attestation: Seal/Stamp Status: Faded, illegible Readable Text: [illegible] A faded circular stamp/seal, centrally located.::>

The University of Minnesota adheres to the principle that all persons shall have equal opportunity and access to facilities in any phase of University activity without regard to race, creed, color, sex, age or national origin. Under this principle, educational, cultural, social, housing, extra curricular and employment opportunities are available to all on an equal basis.
